message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I would like to propose a price of $950000 to purchase the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. It's still a great deal, and I believe it's worth considering.
I understand Alice, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $975000 for the product.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $975000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1025000. It's still a great deal, and I think it's worth considering.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $987500 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $987500, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1015000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $993750 for the product.

I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already made my final offer. I'm not willing to go any lower than $1015000. I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
